Entries.Resort: Heh... I found a piece of his fish jerky on the ride over. Delicious!

Entries.Saloon_Entry: Ah... Finally./I need a drink./Magnus! Pour me some of that Good News!/Hey, I'm back!/Ooh boy, am I thirsty!/I'm parched!
Entries.Saloon_Fri: Oi, Magnus! Gimme another pint of your strongest!
Entries.Sun: It's kinda weird having Magnus fill in for Gus at the Saloon... he's not very talkative.#$e#At least gives me free beer on my birthday, heheh.$h
